subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 36 box
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1208549073
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi Frank,
 
The lipo batteries would cost about 90.00 a piece for 7.2 volt packs at  
5000mh.  They are great packs but the problem with them is the  chargher.  It is 
too damn expensive.  Now the NiMh batteries are  really good.  You can get them 
in many different capacities.  The ones  we use are 4200 mh but now they are 
up to 4800 mh and that is a hell of a lot of  power, LOL.  I was just curious 
because they might be lighter than the gelk  cell packs.
 
Jeff



**************Need a new ride? Check out the largest site for U.S. used car 
listings at AOL Autos.
